verses.verse: נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֣ר <S%H5020><s%> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar Nebuchadnezzar מַלְכָּ֗א <S%H4430><s%> mal-Ka, the king לְֽכָל־ <S%H3606><s%> le-chol unto all עַֽמְמַיָּ֞א <S%H5972><s%> 'am-mai-Ya people אֻמַיָּ֧א <S%H524><s%> 'u-mai-Ya nations וְלִשָּׁנַיָּ֛א <S%H3961><s%> ve-lish-sha-nai-Ya and languages דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> di- forasmuch; דָאֲרִין da-'a-rin כדָיְרִ֥ין <S%H1753><s%> da-ye-Rin dwell קבְּכָל־ <S%H3606><s%> be-chol in all אַרְעָ֖א <S%H772><s%> 'ar-'A the earth שְׁלָמְכ֥וֹן <S%H8001><s%> she-la-me-Chon Peace יִשְׂגֵּֽא׃ <S%H7680><s%> yis-Ge. be multiplied

אָֽתַיָּא֙ <S%H852><s%> 'a-tai-Ya the signs וְתִמְהַיָּ֔א <S%H8540><s%> ve-tim-hai-Ya, and wonders דִּ֚י <S%H1768><s%> di which עֲבַ֣ד <S%H5648><s%> 'a-Vad hath wrought עִמִּ֔י <S%H5974><s%> 'im-Mi, toward אֱלָהָ֖א <S%H426><s%> 'e-la-Ha God; עִלָּיָא 'il-la-ya כעִלָּאָ֑ה <S%H5943><s%> 'il-la-'Ah; high קשְׁפַ֥ר <S%H8232><s%> she-Far it good קָֽדָמַ֖י <S%H6925><s%> ka-da-Mai I thought לְהַחֲוָיָֽה׃ <S%H2324><s%> le-ha-cha-va-Yah. to shew

אָת֙וֹהִי֙ <S%H852><s%> a-To-hi [are] his signs כְּמָ֣ה <S%H4101><s%> ke-Mah How רַבְרְבִ֔ין <S%H7260><s%> rav-re-Vin, great וְתִמְה֖וֹהִי <S%H8540><s%> ve-tim-Ho-hi [are] his wonders כְּמָ֣ה <S%H4101><s%> ke-Mah and how תַקִּיפִ֑ין <S%H8624><s%> tak-ki-Fin; mighty מַלְכוּתֵהּ֙ <S%H4437><s%> mal-chu-Teh his kingdom מַלְכ֣וּת <S%H4437><s%> mal-Chut kingdom עָלַ֔ם <S%H5957><s%> 'a-Lam, [is] an everlasting וְשָׁלְטָנֵ֖הּ <S%H7985><s%> ve-shal-ta-Neh and his dominion עִם־ <S%H5974><s%> 'im- [is] from דָּ֥ר <S%H1859><s%> dar generation וְדָֽר׃ <S%H1859><s%> ve-Dar. to generation

אֲנָ֣ה <S%H576><s%> 'a-Nah I נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֗ר <S%H5020><s%> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar, Nebuchadnezzar שְׁלֵ֤ה <S%H7954><s%> she-Leh at rest הֲוֵית֙ <S%H1934><s%> ha-Veit was בְּבֵיתִ֔י <S%H1005><s%> be-vei-Ti, in mine house וְרַעְנַ֖ן <S%H7487><s%> ve-ra'-Nan and flourishing בְּהֵיכְלִֽי׃ <S%H1965><s%> be-hei-che-Li. in my palace

חֵ֥לֶם <S%H2493><s%> Che-lem a dream חֲזֵ֖ית <S%H2370><s%> cha-Zeit I saw וִֽידַחֲלִנַּ֑נִי <S%H1763><s%> vi-da-cha-lin-Na-ni; which made me afraid וְהַרְהֹרִין֙ <S%H2031><s%> ve-har-ho-Rin and the thoughts עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> 'al- upon מִשְׁכְּבִ֔י <S%H4903><s%> mish-ke-Vi, my bed וְחֶזְוֵ֥י <S%H2376><s%> ve-chez-Vei and the visions רֵאשִׁ֖י <S%H7217><s%> re-Shi of my head יְבַהֲלֻנַּֽנִי׃ <S%H927><s%> ye-va-ha-lun-Na-ni. troubled

וּמִנִּי֙ <S%H4481><s%> u-min-Ni I שִׂ֣ים <S%H7761><s%> sim made טְעֵ֔ם <S%H2942><s%> te-'Em, a decree לְהַנְעָלָ֣ה <S%H5954><s%> le-han-'a-Lah to bring קָֽדָמַ֔י <S%H6925><s%> ka-da-Mai, before לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3606><s%> le-Chol in all חַכִּימֵ֣י <S%H2445><s%> chak-ki-Mei the wise בָבֶ֑ל <S%H895><s%> va-Vel; [men] of Babylon דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> di- forasmuch פְשַׁ֥ר <S%H6591><s%> fe-Shar unto me the interpretation חֶלְמָ֖א <S%H2493><s%> chel-Ma of the dream יְהֽוֹדְעֻנַּֽנִי׃ <S%H3046><s%> ye-Hod-'un-Na-ni. me that they might make known

בֵּאדַ֣יִן <S%H116><s%> be-Da-yin Then; עָלֲלִין 'a-la-lin כעָלִּ֗ין <S%H5954><s%> 'al-Lin, bring in קחַרְטֻמַיָּא֙ <S%H2749><s%> char-tu-mai-Ya in the magicians אָֽשְׁפַיָּ֔א <S%H826><s%> 'a-she-fai-Ya, the astrologers; כַּשְׂדָּיֵא kas-da-ye ככַּשְׂדָּאֵ֖י <S%H3779><s%> kas-da-'Ei Chaldean קוְגָזְרַיָּ֑א <S%H1505><s%> ve-ga-ze-rai-Ya; and the soothsayers וְחֶלְמָ֗א <S%H2493><s%> ve-chel-Ma, the dream אָמַ֤ר <S%H560><s%> 'a-Mar told אֲנָה֙ <S%H576><s%> 'a-Nah and I קֳדָ֣מֵיה֔וֹן <S%H6925><s%> ko-Da-mei-Hon, before וּפִשְׁרֵ֖הּ <S%H6591><s%> u-fish-Reh unto me the interpretation לָא־ <S%H3809><s%> la- them but they did not מְהוֹדְעִ֥ין <S%H3046><s%> me-hod-'In make known לִֽי׃ Li.

וְעַ֣ד <S%H5705><s%> ve-'Ad But at אָחֳרֵ֡ין <S%H318><s%> 'o-cho-Rein the last עַל֩ <S%H5954><s%> 'al came קָֽדָמַ֨י <S%H6925><s%> ka-da-Mai before me דָּנִיֵּ֜אל <S%H1841><s%> da-ni-Yel Daniel דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> di- whose שְׁמֵ֤הּ <S%H8036><s%> she-Meh whose name בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּר֙ <S%H1096><s%> be-le-te-shatz-Tzar [was] Belteshazzar כְּשֻׁ֣ם <S%H8036><s%> ke-Shum according to the name אֱלָהִ֔י <S%H426><s%> 'e-la-Hi, of my god וְדִ֛י <S%H1768><s%> ve-Di whom רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7308><s%> Ru-ach- and in whom [is] the spirit אֱלָהִ֥ין <S%H426><s%> 'e-la-Hin gods קַדִּישִׁ֖ין <S%H6922><s%> kad-di-Shin of the holy בֵּ֑הּ <S%H99999><s%> Beh; וְחֶלְמָ֖א <S%H2493><s%> ve-chel-Ma the dream קָֽדָמ֥וֹהִי <S%H6925><s%> ka-da-Mo-hi and before אַמְרֵֽת׃ <S%H560><s%> 'am-Ret. him I told

בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּר֮ <S%H1096><s%> be-le-te-shatz-Tzar O Belteshazzar רַ֣ב <S%H7229><s%> rav master חַרְטֻמַיָּא֒ <S%H2749><s%> char-tu-mai-Ya of the magicians דִּ֣י׀ <S%H1768><s%> di since אֲנָ֣ה <S%H576><s%> 'a-Nah because I יִדְעֵ֗ת <S%H3046><s%> yid-'Et, know דִּ֠י <S%H1768><s%> di which ר֣וּחַ <S%H7308><s%> Ru-ach that the spirit אֱלָהִ֤ין <S%H426><s%> 'e-la-Hin gods קַדִּישִׁין֙ <S%H6922><s%> kad-di-Shin of the holy בָּ֔ךְ Bach, וְכָל־ <S%H3606><s%> ve-chol all רָ֖ז <S%H7328><s%> raz secret לָא־ <S%H3809><s%> la- or even אָנֵ֣ס <S%H598><s%> 'a-Nes troubleth לָ֑ךְ <S%H99999><s%> Lach; חֶזְוֵ֨י <S%H2376><s%> chez-Vei me the visions חֶלְמִ֧י <S%H2493><s%> chel-Mi of my dream דִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> di- which חֲזֵ֛ית <S%H2370><s%> cha-Zeit that I have seen וּפִשְׁרֵ֖הּ <S%H6591><s%> u-fish-Reh and the interpretation אֱמַֽר׃ <S%H560><s%> 'e-Mar. thee tell

וְחֶזְוֵ֥י <S%H2376><s%> ve-chez-Vei Thus [were] the visions רֵאשִׁ֖י <S%H7217><s%> re-Shi of mine head עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> 'al- in מִשְׁכְּבִ֑י <S%H4903><s%> mish-ke-Vi; my bed חָזֵ֣ה <S%H2370><s%> cha-Zeh was looking הֲוֵ֔ית <S%H1934><s%> ha-Veit, become וַאֲל֥וּ <S%H431><s%> va-'a-Lu and behold אִילָ֛ן <S%H363><s%> 'i-Lan a tree בְּג֥וֹא <S%H1459><s%> be-Go in the midst אַרְעָ֖א <S%H772><s%> 'ar-'A of the earth וְרוּמֵ֥הּ <S%H7314><s%> ve-ru-Meh and the height שַׂגִּֽיא׃ <S%H7690><s%> sag-Gi. thereof [was] great

רְבָ֥ה <S%H7236><s%> re-Vah grew אִֽילָנָ֖א <S%H363><s%> 'i-la-Na The tree וּתְקִ֑ף <S%H8631><s%> u-te-Kif; and was strong וְרוּמֵהּ֙ <S%H7314><s%> ve-ru-Meh and the height יִמְטֵ֣א <S%H4291><s%> yim-Te thereof reached לִשְׁמַיָּ֔א <S%H8065><s%> lish-mai-Ya, unto heaven וַחֲזוֹתֵ֖הּ <S%H2379><s%> va-cha-zo-Teh and the sight לְס֥וֹף <S%H5491><s%> le-Sof thereof to the end כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> kol- of all אַרְעָֽא׃ <S%H772><s%> 'ar-'A. the earth

עָפְיֵ֤הּ <S%H6074><s%> 'a-fe-Yeh The leaves שַׁפִּיר֙ <S%H8209><s%> shap-Pir thereof [were] fair וְאִנְבֵּ֣הּ <S%H4><s%> ve-'in-Beh and the fruit שַׂגִּ֔יא <S%H7690><s%> sag-Gi, thereof much וּמָז֨וֹן <S%H4203><s%> u-ma-Zon and in it [was] meat לְכֹ֖לָּא־ <S%H3606><s%> le-Chol-la- for all בֵ֑הּ Veh; תְּחֹת֜וֹהִי <S%H8460><s%> te-cho-To-hi under תַּטְלֵ֣ל׀ <S%H2927><s%> tat-Lel had shadow חֵיוַ֣ת <S%H2423><s%> chei-Vat the beasts בָּרָ֗א <S%H1251><s%> ba-Ra, of the field וּבְעַנְפ֙וֹהִי֙ <S%H6056><s%> u-ve-'an-Fo-hi in the boughs; יְדֻרוּן ye-du-run כיְדוּרָן֙ <S%H1753><s%> ye-du-Ran dwell קצִפֲּרֵ֣י <S%H6853><s%> tzip-pa-Rei it and the fowls שְׁמַיָּ֔א <S%H8065><s%> she-mai-Ya, of the heaven וּמִנֵּ֖הּ <S%H4481><s%> u-min-Neh of it יִתְּזִ֥ין <S%H2110><s%> yit-te-Zin was fed כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> kol- thereof and all בִּשְׂרָֽא׃ <S%H1321><s%> bis-Ra. flesh

חָזֵ֥ה <S%H2370><s%> cha-Zeh was looking הֲוֵ֛ית <S%H1934><s%> ha-Veit in בְּחֶזְוֵ֥י <S%H2376><s%> be-chez-Vei in the visions רֵאשִׁ֖י <S%H7217><s%> re-Shi of my head עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> 'al- upon מִשְׁכְּבִ֑י <S%H4903><s%> mish-ke-Vi; my bed וַאֲלוּ֙ <S%H431><s%> va-'a-Lu and behold עִ֣יר <S%H5894><s%> 'ir a watcher וְקַדִּ֔ישׁ <S%H6922><s%> ve-kad-Dish, and an holy one מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> min- from שְׁמַיָּ֖א <S%H8065><s%> she-mai-Ya heaven נָחִֽת׃ <S%H5182><s%> na-Chit. came down

קָרֵ֨א <S%H7123><s%> ka-Re He cried בְחַ֜יִל <S%H2429><s%> ve-Cha-yil aloud וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3652><s%> ve-Chen thus אָמַ֗ר <S%H560><s%> 'a-Mar, and said גֹּ֤דּוּ <S%H1414><s%> God-du Hew down אִֽילָנָא֙ <S%H363><s%> 'i-la-Na the tree וְקַצִּ֣צוּ <S%H7113><s%> ve-katz-Tzi-tzu and cut off עַנְפ֔וֹהִי <S%H6056><s%> an-Fo-hi, his branches אַתַּ֥רוּ <S%H5426><s%> 'at-Ta-ru shake off עָפְיֵ֖הּ <S%H6074><s%> 'a-fe-Yeh his leaves וּבַדַּ֣רוּ <S%H921><s%> u-vad-Da-ru and scatter אִנְבֵּ֑הּ <S%H4><s%> 'in-Beh; his fruit תְּנֻ֤ד <S%H5111><s%> te-Nud get away חֵֽיוְתָא֙ <S%H2423><s%> chei-ve-Ta let the beasts מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> min- from תַּחְתּ֔וֹהִי <S%H8479><s%> tach-To-hi, under it וְצִפְּרַיָּ֖א <S%H6853><s%> ve-tzip-pe-rai-Ya and the fowls מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> min- from עַנְפֽוֹהִי׃ <S%H6056><s%> an-Fo-hi. his branches

בְּרַ֨ם <S%H1297><s%> be-Ram Nevertheless עִקַּ֤ר <S%H6136><s%> 'ik-Kar the stump שָׁרְשׁ֙וֹהִי֙ <S%H8330><s%> sha-re-Sho-hi of his roots בְּאַרְעָ֣א <S%H772><s%> be-'ar-'A in the earth שְׁבֻ֔קוּ <S%H7662><s%> she-Vu-ku, leave וּבֶֽאֱסוּר֙ <S%H613><s%> u-ve-'e-Sur even with a band דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> di- forasmuch פַרְזֶ֣ל <S%H6523><s%> far-Zel of iron וּנְחָ֔שׁ <S%H5174><s%> u-ne-Chash, and brass בְּדִתְאָ֖א <S%H1883><s%> be-dit-'A in the tender grass דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> di forasmuch בָרָ֑א <S%H1251><s%> va-Ra; of the field וּבְטַ֤ל <S%H2920><s%> u-ve-Tal with the dew שְׁמַיָּא֙ <S%H8065><s%> she-mai-Ya of heaven יִצְטַבַּ֔ע <S%H6647><s%> yitz-tab-Ba', and let it be wet וְעִם־ <S%H5974><s%> ve-'im- [be] with חֵיוְתָ֥א <S%H2423><s%> cheiv-Ta the beasts חֲלָקֵ֖הּ <S%H2508><s%> cha-la-Keh and [let] his portion בַּעֲשַׂ֥ב <S%H6211><s%> ba-'a-Sav in the grass אַרְעָֽא׃ <S%H772><s%> 'ar-'A. of the earth
